Best Freight Forwarding Software in Bangladesh

ZAMAN IT provide the best freight forwarding software in Bangladesh. You can manage your sea export, sea import, air export, air import by our Freight Forwarding Software ERP. More than 37 company are using our freight forwarding software – “Smart Freight”. We are 16 years experienced om freight forwarding software. Most of the top level freight forwarding companies in Bangladesh are using our freight forwarding software. EASE Logistics, 2C Shipping, CMX and many other top freight forwarding companies are using our Smart Freight Software.

Call Now: 01973009007
Order Now
Application Features
Application Features of Freight Forwarding Software in Bangladesh

Real-Time Tracking

Document Management

Customs Clearance Support

Shipment Scheduling

Rate Calculator

Inventory Management

Multi-Modal Transportation

Alerts and Notifications

Freight Forwarding Software in Bangladesh

Freight forwarding software in Bangladesh streamlines logistics and transportation, managing shipments and customs documentation efficiently. It provides real-time tracking, automates compliance with local regulations, and integrates with ERP systems and carrier networks. Key features include multi-modal transportation management, CRM tools for client interactions, and reporting capabilities for operational insights. Local software providers often customize solutions to address regional needs, enhancing efficiency and reducing errors. This software is crucial for optimizing supply chain operations, improving transparency, and lowering costs in Bangladesh’s growing logistics sector.

Freight Forwarding Software Price in Bangladesh

Software Module

Price

Sea Export

99,000 taka

Sea Import

99,000 taka

Air Export

99,000 taka

Air Import

99,000 taka

Total

396,000 taka

SEA EXPORT

Here is the software benefits

Sea Booking:

First of all, you need to order at Sea booking module with Date, Carrier, Hand Over Place, Port of Loading, Port of Destination, Mother Vessel, Feeder Vessel, etc. Also can Add, Edit, View, Print, and export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

Stuffing:

After submitting Sea Booking, you need to add Customer, Goods Receive Date, Cargo Receive Date, Stuffing Cost, Trade Container Type, Container Number, Supplier, Volume, Quantity, Gross Weight, etc. Also can Add, Edit, View, Print, and export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

Shipment Advice:

At the third step, you can use multiple Shipment Advice from single Sea Booking with Container Information, etc. Also can Add, Edit, View, Print, and export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

Importer Security Filing (ISF):

Also add Buyer, Ship to Party, SCAC CODE, Master B/L, House B/L, AMS HBL, Harmonized Tariff Schedule, Consolidator or Stuffer, etc. Also can Add, Edit, View, Print, and export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

Debit Note:

Helping on Shipment Booking No. you can create a bill with Shipper, Bill No. Account Name, Account Items, attached documents, Status and Payment type, etc. Also can Add, Edit, View, Print, and export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

Freight Invoice:

Helping on Shipment Booking No. you can create a bill with Shipper, Bill No. Account Name, Account Items, Bank Details, attached documents, Status and Payment type, etc. Also can Add, Edit, View, Print, and export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

Credit Note:

Helping on Shipment Booking No. you can create a bill with Shipper, Bill No. Account Name, Account Items, attached documents, Status and Payment type, etc. Also can Add, Edit, View, Print, and export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

Money Receipt:

Helping on Shipment Booking No. you can create a bill with Shipper, Bill No. Account Name, Account Items, attached documents, Status and Payment type, etc. Also can Add, Edit, View, Print, and export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

Debit Voucher:

Helping on Shipment Booking No. you can create a bill with Shipper, Bill No. Account Name, Account Items, attached documents, Status, and Payment type, etc. Also can Add, Edit, View, Print, and export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

Profit & Loss Statement:

Invoice No., Items, Description, Unit, Charge/Unit, Currency, Charge Amount (In USD.), Total Charge Amount (In USD.), Exch. Rate, Amount (In BDT.). You can export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

SEA IMPORT

Here is the software benefits

Import Shipment:

Starting Shipment module with Date, Consignee, Shipper, House Bill, Master Bill, Port of Loading, Port of Destination, etc. Also can Add, Edit, View, Print, and export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

Arrival Notice:

By Reference Number, you can create Arrival Notice along with submitted information from Import Shipment. Also can Add, Edit, View, Print, and export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

Forwarding Letter:

Helping of Reference Number, you can create Forwarding Letter by Date, Import Registration Number, Commodity, Line Number, Detention Period. Also can Add, Edit, View, Print, and export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

Delivery Order:

You can get ready Delivery Order with following information like Date, Carrier, Port, Delivery To, Paid Upto, B/E Date, Remarks, etc. Also can Add, Edit, View, Print, and export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

Freight Invoice:

Helping on Shipment Reference No. you can create a bill with Shipper, Bill No. Account Name, Account Items, Bank Details, attached documents, Status and Payment type, etc. Also can Add, Edit, View, Print, and export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

Dr. & Cr. Note:

Helping on Shipment Reference No. you can create a bill with Shipper, Bill No. Account Name, Account Items, attached documents, Status and Payment type, etc. Also can Add, Edit, View, Print, and export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

Money Receipt:

Helping on Shipment Reference No. you can create a bill with Shipper, Bill No. Account Name, Account Items, attached documents, Status and Payment type, etc. Also can Add, Edit, View, Print, and export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

Debit Voucher:

Helping on Shipment Reference No. you can create a bill with Shipper, Bill No. Account Name, Account Items, attached documents, Status and Payment type, etc. Also can Add, Edit, View, Print, and export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

Period Import Shipment:

You can check the Sea Booking list by searching your custom date range like Daily, Weekly, Monthly, Yearly.

Profit & Loss Statement:

Invoice No., Items, Description, Unit, Charge/Unit, Currency, Charge Amount (In USD.), Total Charge Amount (In USD.), Exch. Rate, Amount (In BDT.). You can export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

AIR EXPORT

Here is the software benefits

Shipment:

Basic Information like Date, Consignee, Commodity, Shipper, House Bill, Master Bill, Port of Loading, Port of Destination, Mother Vessel, Feeder Vessel, Container Number, Volume, Quantity, Gross Weight, etc. Also can Add, Edit, View, Print, and export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

Cargo Manifest:

To prepare Cargo Manifest, you need to add the date, Consignee, and Shipment information. Also can Add, Edit, View, Print, and export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

Bill of Lading:

Finally, now you can create a Bill of Lading by helping previously submitted information along with Delivery of goods, Shippers References, Place of Delivery, Marks & Number, Description of Packages & Goods, etc. Also can Add, Edit, View, Print, and export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

Freight Invoice:

Helping on Shipment Reference No. you can create a bill with Shipper, Bill No. Account Name, Account Items, Bank Details, attached documents, Status and Payment type, etc. Also can Add, Edit, View, Print, and export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

Debit Voucher:

Helping on Shipment Booking No. you can create a bill with Shipper, Bill No. Account Name, Account Items, attached documents, Status and Payment type, etc. Also can Add, Edit, View, Print, and export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

Profit & Loss Statement:

Invoice No., Items, Description, Unit, Charge/Unit, Currency, Charge Amount (In USD.), Total Charge Amount (In USD.), Exch. Rate, Amount (In BDT.). You can export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

AIR IMPORT

Here is the software benefits

Shipment:

Submitting Date, Consignee, Commodity, Shipper, House Bill, Master Bill, Port of Loading, Port of Destination, etc. Also can Add, Edit, View, Print, and export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

Freight Invoice:

Helping on Shipment Reference No. you can create bill with Shipper, Bill No. Account Name, Account Items, Bank Details, attached documents, Status and Payment type etc. Also can Add, Edit, View, Print, and export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

Debit Voucher:

Helping on Shipment Booking No. you can create bill with Shipper, Bill No. Account Name, Account Items, attached documents, Status and Payment type etc. Also can Add, Edit, View, Print, and export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

Dr. & Cr. Note:

Helping on Shipment Booking No. you can create bill with Shipper, Bill No. Account Name, Account Items, attached documents, Status and Payment type etc. Also can Add, Edit, View, Print, and export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

Period Shipment:

You can check the Sea Booking list by searching your custom date range like Daily, Weekly, Monthly, Yearly.

Profit & Loss Statement:

Invoice No., Items, Description, Unit, Charge/Unit, Currency, Charge Amount (In USD.), Total Charge Amount (In USD.), Exch. Rate, Amount (In BDT.). You can export to PDF, Excel, Word format.

Development Tools:

The project utilizes HTML & CSS for the front-end development, PHP as the primary programming language, MySQL for database management, and Laravel as the framework to build robust and scalable web applications.

  • HTML & CSS
  • Language: PHP
  • Database: MySQL
  • Framework: Laravel

Payment Procedure

  • Advance: 50%
  • After Delivery: 30%
  • After Free Customization Period & Training: 20%
  • If the client needs more days to customize then additional costs will provide after full customization and after submission of the project. 

Terms & Conditions:

  • Software for 1 company
  • 7 days free customization
  • Unlimited Dedicated Server Space
  • Server Renew 5000 Taka/month
  • Free Support: 3 month

In the evolving logistics landscape of Bangladesh, the need for efficient freight forwarding software is paramount. Freight forwarding software in Bangladesh facilitates the seamless movement of goods, optimizes supply chain management, and ensures compliance with local regulations. As businesses in Bangladesh expand their operations and international trade grows, the demand for robust and feature-rich freight forwarding solutions increases. ZAMAN IT’s “Smart Freight” stands out as the premier choice in this domain, offering a suite of advanced features tailored to the specific needs of the Bangladeshi market.

Essential Features of Freight Forwarding Software in Bangladesh

1. Comprehensive Shipment Management

Freight forwarding software in Bangladesh must handle diverse transportation modes efficiently. This includes managing shipments across air, sea, road, and rail. A top-notch software solution like “Smart Freight” provides comprehensive tools to track and manage these shipments, ensuring timely and accurate delivery.

2. Real-Time Tracking and Visibility

Real-time tracking is a crucial feature of any effective freight forwarding software in Bangladesh. With “Smart Freight,” users can monitor the location and status of their shipments at any given time. This real-time visibility helps in proactive decision-making and enhances customer satisfaction by providing up-to-date information.

3. Automated Customs Documentation

Compliance with local customs regulations is a significant concern in Bangladesh. Freight forwarding software in Bangladesh, particularly “Smart Freight,” automates the generation of essential customs documentation. This reduces manual errors, speeds up the customs clearance process, and ensures adherence to regulatory requirements.

4. Integration with Local Carrier Networks

Integration with local carriers and logistics partners is essential for efficient freight management. “Smart Freight” seamlessly integrates with Bangladeshi carrier networks, facilitating easy booking, tracking, and management of shipments. This feature helps businesses streamline their operations and enhance connectivity with local service providers.

5. Multi-Modal Transportation Management

Bangladesh’s logistics sector relies on various transportation modes. A versatile freight forwarding software should support multi-modal transportation management. “Smart Freight” excels in this aspect by providing tools to manage and optimize routes across different modes, ensuring cost-effective and timely deliveries.

6. Inventory and Warehouse Management

Effective inventory and warehouse management are critical for maintaining supply chain efficiency. Freight forwarding software in Bangladesh, such as “Smart Freight,” offers features to track inventory levels, manage stock, and integrate with warehouse management systems. This ensures accurate inventory data and efficient warehouse operations.

7. Customer Relationship Management (CRM)

CRM features are vital for maintaining strong customer relationships. “Smart Freight” includes CRM tools that provide clients with access to shipment status, documents, and real-time updates. This improves communication, enhances transparency, and boosts customer satisfaction.

8. Comprehensive Reporting and Analytics

Data-driven decision-making is crucial for optimizing logistics operations. Freight forwarding software in Bangladesh like “Smart Freight” offers robust reporting and analytics capabilities. Users can generate detailed reports on performance, costs, and efficiencies, providing valuable insights for strategic planning.

9. User-Friendly Interface

An intuitive and user-friendly interface is essential for ease of use. “Smart Freight” features a well-designed dashboard that simplifies navigation and enhances user experience. This ease of use reduces training time and increases operational efficiency.

10. Scalability and Customization

As businesses grow, their software needs evolve. “Smart Freight” is designed to be scalable and customizable, allowing businesses to adapt the software to their specific needs and scale it according to their growth. This flexibility ensures long-term usability and value.

11. Security and Data Protection

Security is a top priority in freight forwarding software. “Smart Freight” incorporates advanced security measures, including data encryption and access controls, to protect sensitive information. This ensures that data remains secure and confidential, safeguarding against potential breaches.

12. Local Adaptation and Support

Freight forwarding software in Bangladesh must address local challenges and provide relevant support. ZAMAN IT’s “Smart Freight” is tailored to the Bangladeshi market, offering features that align with local regulations, currency, and language. Additionally, ZAMAN IT provides excellent local support to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing assistance.

Why ZAMAN IT’s “Smart Freight” is the Best Choice for Freight Forwarding Software in Bangladesh

1. Tailored Solutions for the Bangladeshi Market

ZAMAN IT understands the unique challenges of the Bangladeshi logistics sector. “Smart Freight” is specifically designed to meet the needs of local businesses, incorporating features that address regional regulatory requirements and operational demands. This tailored approach ensures that users get a solution that fits their specific needs.

2. Advanced Technology and Innovation

“Smart Freight” incorporates the latest technological advancements and innovative features. From real-time tracking to automated customs documentation, the software leverages cutting-edge technology to enhance operational efficiency and accuracy.

3. Seamless Integration with Local Networks

One of the standout features of “Smart Freight” is its seamless integration with Bangladeshi carrier networks and logistics partners. This integration facilitates efficient booking, tracking, and management of shipments, making it easier for businesses to connect with local service providers.

4. Comprehensive Customer Support

ZAMAN IT offers exceptional customer support for “Smart Freight.” Their dedicated support team provides assistance with implementation, troubleshooting, and ongoing maintenance, ensuring that businesses receive the help they need to maximize the software’s benefits.

5. Proven Track Record

ZAMAN IT has a proven track record of delivering high-quality software solutions in Bangladesh. Their experience and expertise in the logistics sector make “Smart Freight” a reliable choice for businesses looking to enhance their freight forwarding operations.

6. Scalability and Flexibility

“Smart Freight” is designed to grow with your business. Its scalable and customizable features allow businesses to adapt the software to their evolving needs and expand their operations efficiently.

7. Enhanced Security Features

With data security being a top priority, “Smart Freight” incorporates robust security measures to protect sensitive information. This focus on security ensures that businesses can operate confidently, knowing their data is safeguarded.

8. Positive User Feedback

Many businesses in Bangladesh have reported positive experiences with “Smart Freight.” User feedback highlights the software’s effectiveness, ease of use, and the significant improvements it brings to logistics operations.

 

In the competitive landscape of freight forwarding software in Bangladesh, ZAMAN IT’s “Smart Freight” emerges as the leading solution. Its comprehensive features, tailored approach, and commitment to innovation make it the ideal choice for businesses seeking to optimize their logistics operations. With advanced technology, seamless integration, and exceptional support, “Smart Freight” provides a robust platform for managing shipments, ensuring compliance, and enhancing overall efficiency. For businesses in Bangladesh looking to stay ahead in the logistics sector, investing in ZAMAN IT’s “Smart Freight” is a strategic move towards achieving operational excellence and sustained growth
